1.content:
You lay there in bed comfortably relaxing watching some tv when you begin to feel the familiar feeling of yearning to spend a little time with some beautiful girl. How? How can I find someone? Quickly you realize that you live in the year 2019 and it’s easier than ever to find a match for yourself. So you hop onto the app store on your phone and scroll through the plethora of dating services offered. One in particular catches your eye called “Mod Love”

‘Hmmm, sounds interesting enough.’ You think to yourself.

So you make a couple taps, and voila Mod Love is now happily centered on your home screen awaiting to be opened.
1.title: Mod Love

choices: Janie

12.content:
As you start up the app you are presented a list of search options. Being the chivalrous gentleman you are you click "personality" you can't help but notice the "body mods" search tag, is this a dating app for people with piercings?

Once you got your profile set up you bring up the results.

First one is named Janie:
Personality - outgoing, carefree, loves comics.
Body mods - feethands. (What the hell does that mean? You wonder to yourself)
In her photos you can see that she is a beautiful brunette with sea/green eyes and in most of them she is with a group of friends, enough to back her claim to being outgoing.

After her is Kassandra:
Personality - friendly, quiet.
Body mods - private.
She only has one photo, an unusually framed portrait. She has short black hair with golden highlights.

Sadie:
Personality - likes talking to people, energetic, professional vlogger.
Body mods - various piercings, SWB (now we're bringing cars into this?)
You quickly find she has a number of videos posted of her wearing a GoPro on her hip as she walks around town and talks to random people. Her profile picture looks quite professionally done, she has dyed pink hair and a few noticeable piercings.

This one is a little more interesting, the username is listed simply as "come for some fun tiger" all other details were set to private.

Who do you pick first?
12.title: Search by Personality

124.content:
The feeling of adventure nags at you until you click on the girl's profile that is left completely blank.

Within a few minutes you get a notification that she is interested too, you message back and forth and arrange a date to meet up.

"I'll be the one wearing the pink veil. See you on Friday!" Is her last message.

The week passes and now you're pulling up to the place you agreed to meet up at, a curious establishment called "Modder's Paradise, a place for freaks and lovers of freaks."

You park your car and approach the building and you immediately spot your date, the pink veil exactly as she said she would be wearing.

But you notice something else about her right off the bat.

She was waving her top right arm while her bottom right was hanging at her side, she brought the foot replacing her upper left hand to her mouth to call you while bracing the lower left foot arm on her hip.

"Hey there's that hunk I've been waiting to see! Don't be shy, I don't bite I only scratch." She then makes a pouncing motion with her four arm feet.

12413.content:
A whole world of people like this? Now you're excited. "Well what are we waiting for?" You say now walking towards the building, she claps her handfeet and rushes after you.

You realize the business you came to appears to be a comic and game store leaving you slightly confused.

"The comic shop is a cover for what we've got going on here, and it helps to attract the geeks and nerds who may be desperately into the body modding stuff but haven't sought us out yet."

As you step in the front door you see behind the desk a cute girl in her early twenties leaning back in her chair using an extra set of arms replacing her legs to fiddle with a rubix cube. "Hey Sam. Reeling in another catch?"

You spot an eye roll from "Sam" as she leads you to the back of the store. Right next to the bathrooms you notice bright swirling colours coming from a room to the left. She quickly pulls you into this room.

Embedded into the wall is a series of rocks and gems and in the middle is a portal.

Sam walks over to a table and grabs a tray covered in unusual looking candies.

"Here if you eat these and then go through you will come out in the form you most desire right now."

1243.content:
What catches your eye is the fact that this woman has unnaturally red skin, two horns protruding from her head, a tail complete with a spade and hooves replacing her feet as though she were a demon.

The second she notices you she begins to saunter over in your direction, eyes locked with yours. You hear audible clacking noises when her feet make contact with the ground.

"So you're new to the whole body mods thing huh?" You simply stand there confused. "I'll take that as a yes. Come on in I'll get you familiar."

In stunned silence you follow. Once inside you start to notice the other patrons, some are normal like you but by far the majority are modified in some way. You see a woman with purple skin holding her detached head under her arm, a couple at a table the guy having four arms and no legs while his girlfriend had the inverse, several people had their heads simply attached to their lower halves with no torso.

Your date waved down an employee "Hey Maggie! Table for two." You were both seated by a woman with four arms and a fifth arm replacing her head. She waves enthusiastically with her head/arm and hands you both a menu to look over and moves on to a different table.

"So uh." You finally get the courage to spit out. "Have you got a name?"

"Haddie. Kinda like the Greek god." Her cheeks rising slightly in a grin. (Which you can barely make out with her wearing that veil.)

"Ok... So what's the story behind all this?"

"Wow you really are a virgin to body modding huh? Well not too long ago people around this area started changing their bodies, either by magic or by science. Anyway a bit of a subculture sprung up around it and some folks set up a restaurant chain and a dating app for people to find love. Also to attract new people like you in."

"Interesting. So you just wanted to bring me here to get a rando into this stuff?"

"Pretty much." At this point you start to realize that something is off with her voice, it sounds as though it was covered by something thick like wood but you don't think much of it right now.

You now see "Maggie" the waitress return with a pencil in her head hand ready to take your order. Haddie asks for the soup special, and you order a triple grilled cheese.

"Hey you should try one of the drinks, they're a lot of fun." She says winking.
1243.title: She has cherry red skin and hooves like a demon

12431.content:
Eyeing the menu you get a strong idea that these drinks do a bit more than your average liquid courage.

"Alright colour me interested. Order me up that scrambler's rum then."

You can see the outline of a smile on your date's face again. "I had a good feeling about you. That's one of my favourites."

Maggie took your orders and left you to continue your evening. You continue to break the ice chatting about your lives, you tell her about your job and she tells you she used to be a software engineer, in fact she did a lot of the programming for the app.

"So now I make a passive living off the app and advertising for various body mod related products."

"Impressive. So when did you get into the body modding community if you're this involved?"

"Oh I've been like this for a while. Well at least mostly. When I became 18 it turned out I was actually descended from a family of half demons and changed into this. Again mostly." She motioned to her body.

"Wait demons? Do you have like magic powers or something."

"Kinda. But I never really bothered to learn how to use them my real power is with a keyboard."

And with that your food arrives. Maggie hands you a plate with a thick cheesy sandwich and a side of fries, a bowl of Haddie's seafood soup, and a bottle of rum and two shot glasses.

You both thank your waitress and you pour a shot. Then you lift the drink to your lips and down it. As the pleasant burning hits the back of your throat the next thing you know is...
12431.title: Scramblers rum

info.brief_description: You’re an average guy looking for love, lucky you’re using a very special app to do it
info.description:
You’re finally giving into what you’ve resisted doing for so long: downloading and using a dating app. You’ve never much liked the idea of meeting through a screen, but you’re really missing the feeling of being with someone, and that’s the quickest most efficient method. To your initial dismay but eventual delight, you’ve accidentally stumbled on a very special dating app called “Mod Love. “ You soon find out that the women you’re swiping through have very...special qualities that drive you crazy with intrigue. So, who’s going to be your first date?

Acceptable morphs and tf’s include: Body part swapping, rearrangement, and detachment (Would love to see high volume of foot related morphs). Body parts can be mismatched, ie feet replacing hands, arm replacing head, etc. Detached body parts can either be living while disembodied, or lifeless to be treated more like realistic sex toys. Multiple limbs, so girls with six arms, four legs, eight breasts, etc. Body part removal, so women with no arms who use their feet to interact with everything, or no head but somehow retain their senses. Body part birthing, ie a woman who can push out of any orifice a brand new living detached penis, foot, hand, etc. Abilities or excrete food from any holes, ie a woman able to squeeze out ice cream from her butthole, piss out soda from her vagina, etc. Trans, futa, trap, moderate muscle gain, moderate hairiness, anything to make a female have more male qualities. Body from the neck down swaps, ie a beautiful woman’s head on the body of a muscled up hunk. Mind alterations so that everyone thinks strange bodies, or lewd acts using them are totally normal. Clones, conjoinment, moderate absorption/fusing. Very light shrinking and growing, ie a full grown woman becoming only three feet tall, or growing to be eight feet tall. Moderately growing or shrinking body parts, ie morphing a girl to have a butthole three times it’s normal size or shrinking her boobs until they’re less than an A cup. Extreme horniness, ie a woman being dripping wet and can’t control it, or too hard and leaking tons of precum. Celebrity parts are fine ie, a normal girl who morphed her head into Gal Gadots, or one who morphed her ass to be Jennifer Lopez’s. Elastic qualities, being able to stretch a woman’s neck down so she can eat herself out. Strange skin colors and patterns, ie a woman with purple skin and maybe zebra stripes. Tattoos and piercings as natural or as morphs work too!

Not allowed: No furries, actual scat or piss, loli, under 18, extreme expansions, extreme shrink, extreme weight gain, extreme muscle gain, extreme hairiness, death, vore, torture, pain, hate, or ending the story!!
